name: BunZorg
description:
Project ‘Bunzorg’ - the fusion of animal and machine - was deemed a success by the top scientists of the megaconglomerate ‘Pinnacle Research’.

Unbeknownst to the scientists, however, the test rabbit’s high-capacity cyberbrain had been compromised by rival ‘Stoneridge Labs’.

As a hacker employed (but not acknowledged) by Stoneridge, you download 150 Petabytes worth of Pinnacle’s data into the bunny’s brain and maneuver it out of captivity and onto the rooftops...

Design by Kyodan
